issue.title: [CI][C++] Add a testing coverage tool
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be good to estimate what fraction of the code the tests cover. Using a tool such as [CodeCov](https://about.codecov.io) or [Coveralls](https://coveralls.io/) maybe helpful

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15308?focusedCommentId=17474449) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Which language is this for?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15308?focusedCommentId=17474465) by Benson Muite (baksmj):*
C++ to start with, though test coverage for other language bindings would also be good to have. One issue is minimizing duplication of tests in the core and from the bindings.
